And for the ones having trouble with codecs I would recommend K-Lite Mega Codec Pack 4.0.0, it
can be found on:
http://www.free-codecs.com/download/K_Lite_Mega_Codec_Pack.htm

Just install with the standard settings and you will have no codec trouble again

And the media Player Classic on that pack is hell of a player too, it plays even FLV's along with te most popular formats XviD, DivX, Mpg, Mpeg, and it goes on.

Good Luck
If you simply want to watch the movie, vlc player cannot be beat.
